overview: This powerful film revisits the sites most closely associated with Heinrich Himmler and traces the development of his warped ideology. Heinrich Himmler was the creator of the infamous Gestapo, the Waffen SS and the concentration camp network. He was inspired by mystic visions, runes, horoscopes and a longing for a heroic German past. The occult roots of the Third Reich are discussed.
title: The SS and The Occult
